description: Intensive study of musical literature between 1750 and 1900. The course begins with the development of the Viennese Classical School (Haydn, Mozart, Beethoven) and continues with European trends in Romantic opera, Lieder, symphony and chamber music (from Rossini through R. Strauss). Prerequisites: Music 241, 242. Offered fall semester 2013-14 and alternate years.
name: Class & Romantic Eras
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Music 241, 242. Offered fall semester 2013-14 and alternate years.
title: Music Of The Classical And Romantic Eras
